name: Danish Blocks Brawl
description:
Play it also on Android: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ZoopaBig.DBB

W, A, S and D or arrow keys to move the camera, R to place the same unit again, right mouse to remove.

Select from 16 unit types to build your squad spending 100 credits. You opponent does the same first. . At least half of your units need to be not flying units. Try improving your winning time to test your strategic skills. 

Pure skills game, no micro-transactions.  Always fair.

If you lose or draw, you cannot play against a new enemy formation until you beat last one.

If the game takes longer than 60 seconds, it will stop with a draw result.

Let me know in comments, if you would like to play this in multiplayer. If many people ask for it, I will make it!
